responses.rationale: The segment reports factual information about infections and culling without using intensifiers or comparatives with risk-adjectives.
The segment provides factual numbers of birds culled across the nation without using intensifiers or comparatives with risk-adjectives.
The segment reports factual numbers of birds culled in Iowa without using intensifiers or comparatives with risk-adjectives.
The segment provides factual data about Iowa's egg production and chicken inventory without using intensifiers or comparatives with risk-adjectives.
The segment provides factual data about Iowa's turkey production without using intensifiers or comparatives with risk-adjectives.
The segment reports the location of recent cases factually without using intensifiers or comparatives with risk-adjectives.
The segment reports the confirmation of a case factually without using intensifiers or comparatives with risk-adjectives.
The segment reports the number of states with confirmed cases factually without using intensifiers or comparatives with risk-adjectives.
The segment describes the likely mode of disease spread factually without using intensifiers or comparatives with risk-adjectives.
